mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of the audience during the GOP rally
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Clarksburg Engraving Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The audience, separated by counties, during the GOP (Republican) rally of 1964. The photograph was taken from behind the people sitting on the stage. An unidentified man is speaking to the audience. In the background, a banner reads "Welcome Home Governor Underwood."
